pullrequest.title: Merge selection buffer updates from gazebo_4.1 to gazebo5

content.html:
I got a compile error in MainWindow_TEST (not built by Jenkins):

[ 95%] Building CXX object gazebo/gui/CMakeFiles/UNIT_GuiIface_TEST.dir/GuiIface_TEST.cc.o
In file included from /usr/include/qt4/QtTest/qtest.h:46:0,
                 from /usr/include/qt4/QtTest/QtTest:7,
                 from /home/jackie/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/qt_test.h:23,
                 from /home/jackie/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/QTestFixture.hh:31,
                 from /home/jackie/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/MainWindow_TEST.hh:21,
                 from /home/jackie/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/MainWindow_TEST.cc:26:
/home/jackie/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/MainWindow_TEST.cc: In member function ‘void MainWindow_TEST::Selection()’:
/home/jackie/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/MainWindow_TEST.cc:68:3: error: cannot convert ‘gazebo::rendering::VisualPtr {aka boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::rendering::Visual>}’ to ‘bool’ for argument ‘1’ to ‘bool QTest::qVerify(bool, const char*, const char*, const char*, int)’
   QVERIFY(vis);
   ^
/home/jackie/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/MainWindow_TEST.cc:80:3: error: cannot convert ‘gazebo::rendering::VisualPtr {aka boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::rendering::Visual>}’ to ‘bool’ for argument ‘1’ to ‘bool QTest::qVerify(bool, const char*, const char*, const char*, int)’
   QVERIFY(vis2);
   ^
/home/jackie/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/MainWindow_TEST.cc:101:3: error: cannot convert ‘gazebo::rendering::VisualPtr {aka boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::rendering::Visual>}’ to ‘bool’ for argument ‘1’ to ‘bool QTest::qVerify(bool, const char*, const char*, const char*, int)’
   QVERIFY(vis4);
   ^
